title: IGGMC Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 09 Assistant Professor Posts
description: The Indira Gandhi Government Medical College (IGGMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Assistant Professor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MD/MS, DNB, and Post-graduation can apply for the IGGMC Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age lim...
